description: [Lazarus Group](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0032) has renamed malicious code to disguise it as Microsoft's narrator and other legitimate files.(Citation: CISA MAR-10288834-2.v1  TAINTEDSCRIBE MAY 2020)(Citation: ESET Lazarus Jun 2020)(Citation: Qualys LolZarus)
